amendment.description: Amendment authorizes assistance to farmers and ranchers for the assessment and development of on-farm renewable energy resources, including biomass for the production of power and fuels, wind, solar and geothermal.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 31 printed in the Congressional Record to increase assistance to farmers and ranchers for the assessment and development of their on-farm renewable resources, including biomass for the production of power and fuels, wind and solar.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Inslee amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
